Title: downloading games
Html:
The phone supports downloading new applications and games from different WAP services.

Press Menu, and select Games and Game downloads (network service).

The list of available WAP bookmarks is shown. Select the appropriate bookmark to connect to the desired WAP page. If the connection fails, you may not be able to access the WAP page from the WAP service whose connection settings are currently active.

To view the size of memory available for game and application installations, press Menu, and select Games and Memory.

For the availability of different WAP services, pricing and tariffs, contact your network operator and/or the WAP service provider.
Attention: Only install software from sources that offer adequate protection against viruses and other harmful software.
